front.title: IEEE Guide for Testing Medium-Voltage Metal-Enclosed Switchgear for Internal Arcing Faults

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Superseded by IEEE Std C37.20.7-2007. A procedure for testing and evaluating the performance of metal-enclosed switchgear for internal arcing faults is covered. A method of identifying the capabilities of this equipment is given. Service conditions, installation, and application of equipment are also discussed.
